Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the impact of Mercedes-Benz USA moving its headquarters to Atlanta by stating that it will create at least 800 jobs.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or data to support the assertion that moving the headquarters will create 800 jobs.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that moving jobs from one location to another is the same as creating new jobs, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the increase in jobs, such as the natural growth of the automotive industry in the southeast.
